19 // DECLARATION OF UNIFORMGRID
20 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
21 class V_COREEXPORT UniformGrid : public Object, public StructuredGridBase {
22  V_OBJECT(UniformGrid);
23 
24 public:
25  typedef Object Base;
26 
27  // constructor
28  UniformGrid(Index xdim, Index ydim, Index zdim, const Meta &meta=Meta());
29 
30  std::set<Object::const_ptr> referencedObjects() const override;
31 
32  // get/set functions
33  Index getNumDivisions(int c) override { return d()->numDivisions[c]; }
34  Index getNumDivisions(int c) const override { return m_numDivisions[c]; }
35  Index getNumGhostLayers(unsigned dim, GhostLayerPosition pos) override;
36  Index getNumGhostLayers(unsigned dim, GhostLayerPosition pos) const override;
37  Index getGlobalIndexOffset(int c) const override { return d()->indexOffset[c]; }
38  void setGlobalIndexOffset(int d, Index offset) override;
39 
40  // virtual set functions
41  void setNumGhostLayers(unsigned dim, GhostLayerPosition pos, unsigned value) override;
42 
43  // get/set functions for shared memory members
44  Scalar *min() { return d()->min; }
45  Scalar *max() { return d()->max; }
46  const Scalar *min() const { return m_min; }
47  const Scalar *max() const { return m_max; }
48 
49  // GeometryInterface
50  std::pair<Vector, Vector> getBounds() const override;
51  Normals::const_ptr normals() const override;
52  void setNormals(Normals::const_ptr normals);
53 
54  // GridInterface
55  Index getNumVertices() override;
56  Index getNumVertices() const override;
57  std::pair<Vector, Vector> cellBounds(Index elem) const override;
58  Index findCell(const Vector &point, Index hint=InvalidIndex, int flags=NoFlags) const override;
59  bool inside(Index elem, const Vector &point) const override;
60  Interpolator getInterpolator(Index elem, const Vector &point, DataBase::Mapping mapping=DataBase::Vertex, InterpolationMode mode=Linear) const override;
61  Scalar exitDistance(Index elem, const Vector &point, const Vector &dir) const override;
62  Vector getVertex(Index v) const override;
63 
64  void copyAttributes(Object::const_ptr src, bool replace = true) override;
65 
66 private:
67  // mutable pointers to ShmVectors
68  mutable Index m_size;
69  mutable Index m_numDivisions[3];
70  mutable Scalar m_min[3];
71  mutable Scalar m_max[3];
72  mutable Scalar m_dist[3];
73  mutable Index m_ghostLayers[3][2];
74 
75  // data object
76  V_DATA_BEGIN(UniformGrid);
77 
78  shm_obj_ref<Normals> normals;
79  // each of the following variables represents a coordinate (by index, in order x, y, z)
80  Index indexOffset[3]; //< global index offset
81  Index numDivisions[3]; //< number of divisions on each axis (1 more than number of cells)
82  Scalar min[3]; //< coordinates of minimum grid point
83  Scalar max[3]; //< coordinates of maximum grid point
84  Index ghostLayers[3][2]; //< number of ghost cell layers in each x, y, z directions
85 
86  Data(const std::string & name, Index xdim, Index ydim, Index zdim, const Meta &meta=Meta());
87  ~Data();
88  static Data *create(Index xdim=0, Index ydim=0, Index zdim=0, const Meta &meta = Meta());
89 
90  V_DATA_END(UniformGrid);
91 };
